content:
RVP is a GENA-based protocol for Instant Messaging

  • Extends GENA based on DAV functionality

    • Leverages DAV property model for rich notification functionality
    • Uses DAV MKCOL, DELETE, PROPFIND, PROPPATCH methods

  • Implemented by Microsoft for the Exchange Instant Messaging Server

    • Distributed notifications and status information between users, distribution lists, and generic “resources”, across the Internet

  • Strong security features, e.g. SSL

  • Microsoft is working with ISPs, telecommunications vendors to design interoperable notifications systems based on RVP
